text: "Up at Night" is a song by American singer Kehlani featuring Canadian singer Justin Bieber. It was released on March 30, 2022, and serves as the third single to Kehlani's third studio album, Blue Water Road. The song failed to chart on the Billboard Hot 100. It debuted at number 14 on the Bubbling Hot 100. ==References== Category:Dance-pop songs Category:R&B; songs Category:2022 songs Category:Justin Bieber songs
title: Up at Night (song)
